org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.richtext

Class AbstractRichBlockTextNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.AbstractFXGNode
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.richtext.AbstractRichTextNode
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.richtext.AbstractRichTextLeafNode
          • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.richtext.AbstractRichParagraphNode
            • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.richtext.AbstractRichBlockTextNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFXGNode, IPreserveWhiteSpaceNode, ITextNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DivNode

    public abstract class AbstractRichBlockTextNode
extends AbstractRichParagraphNode
    A base class that represents a block text.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setAttribute(String name, String value, Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
      This implementation processes text flow extra attributes that are relevant to the <p> tag, as well as delegates to the parent class to process text leaf or paragraph attributes that are also relevant to the <p> tag.

    • Method Detail

      • setAttribute

        public void setAttribute(String name,
                String value,
                Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        This implementation processes text flow extra attributes that are relevant to the <p> tag, as well as delegates to the parent class to process text leaf or paragraph attributes that are also relevant to the <p> tag.
        Specified by:
        setAttribute in interface IFXGNode
        Overrides:
        setAttribute in class AbstractRichParagraphNode
        Parameters:
        name - the attribute name
        value - the attribute value
        problems - problem collection used to collect problems occurred within this method
        See Also:
        AbstractRichParagraphNode.setAttribute(String, String, Collection)
